title: Full Time White Lotus [Quick Transmigration] - Novel Updates
tags: Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 棠花沾衣   蘇棠
description:
An appearance that is clean and pretty without bruises or dirt.

Approaching every situation with a covered mouth and calculating heart.

If people are cruel, the hand that punishes must be hard. Being aloof but still acting.

To be a human, one must be dignified. Every start must have a finish.

——In short, the Miss Qiao today is working hard on the road to being a professional white lotus.

Male Lead: As long as you are in my embrace, you can do anything.>
